author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
It seems like everyone has just hit a breaking point with the Bcachefs project in the Linux kernel, so much so that Linus Torvalds has gone and marked the project as externally maintained. The problem is that doesn't mean anything, it's not a defined state.

title: Everyone Wants Bcachefs Deleted From Linux Kernel
